newsitem.title: USA: Summit Medical names interim CFO.
newsitem.headline: Summit Medical names interim CFO.

text.p: Summit Medical Systems Inc said Tuesday it has appointed Richard Willemin as interim chief financial officer.

Summit said earlier this month that 1996 revenues would be "substantially less" than the $19.5 million earlier reported because of accounting discrepancies discovered by a new chief financial officer, who resigned after less than a week on the job.
Prior to joining Summit Medical, Willemin served as chief financial officer of Datalogix International Inc, a supplier of process manufacturing and logistics software.
Summit Medical shares rose 1/16 to 3-1/2 Tuesday.
